languages.text: "Боюсь, все именно так, Изгой. Предки трехоких мон-кай решили подчинить себе силу Монолита душ, но раз за разом терпели неудачи. В конце концов они нашли способ совладать с его могуществом — ужасный, болезненный, непростительный. Они разбили Монолит на множество осколков и ослабили души, покоящиеся в нем. А затем..." {n}Арлекина сотрясает от гнева.{/n} "Затем они решили вживлять осколки в свои тела, чтобы усилить способности".

traits.locale_text: "Боюсь, все именно так, Изгой. Предки трехоких мон-кай решили подчинить себе силу Камня Душ, но раз за разом тепрели неудачи. В конце концов они нашли способ собладать с его могуществом — ужасный, болезненный, непростительный. Они разбили камень на множество осколков и ослабили души, покоящиеся в нем. А затем..." {n}Арлекина сотрясает от гнева.{/n} "Затем они решили вживлять осколки Камня Душ в свои тела, чтобы усилить способности".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Alas, you are right, Outcast. The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith, and yet they suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards of the Spirit Monolith inside their bodies to empower their abilities."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, все именно так, Изгой. Предки трехоких мон-кай решили подчинить себе силу Монолита душ, но раз за разом терпели неудачи. В конце концов они нашли способ совладать с его могуществом — ужасный, болезненный, непростительный. Они разбили Монолит на множество осколков и ослабили души, покоящиеся в нем. А затем..." {n}Арлекина сотрясает от гнева.{/n} "Затем они решили вживлять осколки в свои тела, чтобы усилить способности".

Eventually they discovered a way to harness this power — a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many slivers and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards of the Spirit Monolith inside their bodies to empower their abilities."

And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards of the Spirit Monolith inside their bodies to empower their abilities."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: 「哀しいかな、そのとおりだ、追放者。三つ目のモン＝ケイの父祖はスピリット・モノリスの力を意のままにしようとしたが、幾度となく失敗した。最終的にはこの力を利用する方法を見つけた。ひどいやり口だよ。拷問と言ってもいい、容赦ないやり口。奴らはモノリスを砕いて数多のかけらにし、中に込められた魂を弱体化させたんだ。そして…」{n}ハーレクィンは怒りで身体を震わせる。{/n}「そうして奴らはスピリット・モノリスの破片を己の身体に埋め込み、能力を強化したんだ」
languages.original_text: "Alas, you are right, Outcast. The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith, and yet they suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards of the Spirit Monolith inside their bodies to empower their abilities."

traits.locale_text: 「哀しいかな、そのとおりだ、追放者。三つ目のモン＝ケイの父祖はスピリット・モノリスの力を意のままにしようとしたが、幾度となく失敗した。最終的にはこの力を利用する方法を見つけた。ひどいやり口だよ。拷問と言ってもいい、容赦ないやり口。奴らはモノリスを砕いて数多のかけらにし、中に込められた魂を弱体化させたんだ。そして…」{n}ハーレクィンは怒りで身体を震わせる。{/n}「そうして奴らはスピリット・モノリスの破片を己の身体に埋め込み、能力を強化したんだ」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “很遗憾，你说得没错，流浪者。那些三眼猴子的祖先打算控制巨型灵魂石的力量，但却一次又一次地失败。到了最后，他们找到了利用这种力量的方法——一种可怕的方法，一种充满痛苦、不可饶恕的方法。他们损毁了巨型灵魂石，把它化成了无数碎片，削弱了碎片中灵魂的力量，之后……”{n}丑角的声音颤抖着，充满了愤怒。{/n}“之后，他们把巨型灵魂石的碎片放在了他们自己的身体里，强化他们的力量。”
languages.original_text: "Alas, you are right, Outcast. The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith, and yet they suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards of the Spirit Monolith inside their bodies to empower their abilities."

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，你说得没错，流浪者。那些三眼猴子的祖先打算控制巨型灵魂石的力量，但却一次又一次地失败。到了最后，他们找到了利用这种力量的方法——一种可怕的方法，一种充满痛苦、不可饶恕的方法。他们损毁了巨型灵魂石，把它化成了无数碎片，削弱了碎片中灵魂的力量，之后……”{n}丑角的声音颤抖着，充满了愤怒。{/n}“之后，他们把巨型灵魂石的碎片放在了他们自己的身体里，强化他们的力量。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Hélas, vous avez raison, Errante. Les ancêtres de la mon-keigh à trois yeux ont longtemps cherché à s'approprier la puissance du Monolithe aux esprits, en vain. Ils ont fini par trouver un moyen de l'exploiter. Un moyen répugnant, atroce, impardonnable. Ils ont brisé le Monolithe en de nombreux fragments et affaibli les âmes qu'il abritait. Et ensuite... » {n}Tremblant de fureur, l'Arlequin marque une pause.{/n} « Ensuite, ils ont incrusté les fragments du Monolithe aux esprits dans leurs propres corps. »
languages.original_text: "Alas, you are right, Outcast. The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith, and yet they suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards of the Spirit Monolith inside their bodies to empower their abilities."

traits.locale_text: « Hélas, vous avez raison, Errante. Les ancêtres de la mon-keigh à trois yeux ont longtemps cherché à s'approprier la puissance du Monolithe aux esprits, en vain. Ils ont fini par trouver un moyen de l'exploiter. Un moyen répugnant, atroce, impardonnable. Ils ont brisé le Monolithe en de nombreux fragments et affaibli les âmes qu'il abritait. Et ensuite... » {n}Tremblant de fureur, l'arlequin marque une pause.{/n} « Ensuite, ils ont incrusté les fragments du Monolithe aux esprits dans leurs propres corps. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «Por desgracia, tienes razón, proscrita. Los ancestros de la mon-keigh de tres ojos trataron de controlar el poder del Monolito Espiritual, mas fracasaron en todos sus intentos. Finalmente, descubrieron una forma de acceder a su poder; algo terrible, agónico e imperdonable: destruyeron el Monolito en incontables fragmentos y debilitaron las almas que contenía. Y después...». {n}El Arlequín tiembla de ira.{/n} «Después introdujeron los fragmentos del Monolito Espiritual en sus cuerpos para reforzar sus capacidades».
languages.original_text: "Alas, you are right, Outcast. The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith, and yet they suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards of the Spirit Monolith inside their bodies to empower their abilities."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia, tienes razón, proscrita. Los ancestros de la mon-keigh de tres ojos trataron de controlar el poder del Monolito Espiritual, mas fracasaron en todos sus intentos. Finalmente, descubrieron una forma de acceder a su poder; algo terrible, agónico e imperdonable: destruyeron el Monolito en incontables fragmentos y debilitaron las almas que contenía. Y después...». {n}El Arlequín tiembla de ira.{/n} «Después introdujeron los fragmentos del Monolito Espiritual en sus cuerpos para reforzar sus capacidades».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Ihr habt leider recht, Ausgestoßene. Die Ahnen des dreiäugigen Chem-Pan-Sey wollten die Macht des Geistesmonoliths befehligen, und doch sind sie wieder und wieder gescheitert. Schließlich haben sie einen Weg gefunden, diese Macht zu nutzen. Einen grauenhaften Weg, qualvoll und unverzeihlich. Sie haben den Monolithen in unzählige Splitter zertrümmert und die Seelen darin geschwächt. Und dann ..." {n}Der Harlekin bebt vor Wut.{/n} "Dann haben sie die Splitter des Geistesmonoliths in ihre Körper eingesetzt, um ihre Fähigkeiten zu verstärken."
languages.original_text: "Alas, you are right, Outcast. The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith, and yet they suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards of the Spirit Monolith inside their bodies to empower their abilities."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt leider recht, Ausgestoßene. Die Ahnen des dreiäugigen Chem-Pan-Sey wollten die Macht des Geistesmonoliths befehligen, und doch sind sie wieder und wieder gescheitert. Schließlich haben sie einen Weg gefunden, diese Macht zu nutzen. Einen grauenhaften Weg, qualvoll und unverzeihlich. Sie haben den Monolithen in unzählige Splitter zertrümmert und die Seelen darin geschwächt. Und dann ..." {n}Der Harlekin bebt vor Wut.{/n} "Dann haben sie die Splitter des Geistesmonoliths in ihre Körper eingesetzt, um ihre Fähigkeiten zu verstärken."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki haklısın Yurtsuz. Üç gözlü mon-keighin ataları, Ruh Monoliti'nin gücüne hükmetmeye çalışıp defalarca başarısız oldu. En nihayetinde ise bu güçten faydalanmanın bir yolunu keşfettiler. Korkunç bir yol, ızdıraplı ve affedilmez. Monolit'i pek çok ufak parçaya bölüp içindeki ruhların gücünü zayıflattılar. Ardından da..." {n}Arleken, hiddetle titriyor.{/n} "Ardından da kabiliyetlerine güç katmak için Ruh Monoliti'nin taşlarını kendi vücutlarının içine koydular."
languages.original_text: "Alas, you are right, Outcast. The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith, and yet they suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards of the Spirit Monolith inside their bodies to empower their abilities."

traits.locale_text: "Ne yazık ki haklısın Yurtsuz. Üç gözlü mon-keighin ataları, Ruh Monoliti'nin gücüne hükmetmeye çalışsa da defalarca başarısız olmuştu. Nihayetinde bu güçten faydalanmanın bir yolunu keşfettiler. Korkunç bir yoldu bu; ızdıraplı ve affedilmezdi. Monolit'i pek çok ufak parçaya bölüp içindeki ruhların gücünü zayıflattılar. Ardından da..." {n}Arleken, hiddetle titriyor.{/n} "Ardından da kendi kabiliyetlerine güç katmak için Ruh Monoliti'nin taşlarını kendi vücutlarının içine koydular."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
